root.name: Police Quest: In Pursuit of the Death Angel
root.description: In Police Quest: In Pursuit of the Death Angel, you play as rookie patrol officer Sonny Bonds as he tracks down the notorious drug dealer known as "The Death Angel" in the fictional town of Lytton, California. The player uses real police procedures (as outlined in the extensive instruction manual) to handle everything from routine traffic stops to a homicide. Originally released using the Adventure Game Interpreter in 1987, the game was remade in glorious VGA in 1992 using the SCI engine.
